comments.en: Toner Cartridge (15000 pages), Drum Cartridge (30000 pages)

Xerox DocuPrint N4512 with PostScript module. 12 pages/min, 15 sec until the first page comes out, 2 x 250 sheet, max. page size is Legal, built-in duplex unit. network card (included in "N" model), additional paper trays, envelope feeder available as options. 2 MB standard, expandable to 50 MB with 4MB or 16MB 60/70ns EDO or FastPage SIMMs.
Understands PostScript, PCL 5e, and PJL, so there is no problem to use it under free operating systems. one can use also use PJL utilities (as PUP) to change default settings. There is also the proprietary printing software "CentreWare" (for LPD or LPRng systems, see section for downloadable software, platform "UNIX" on the printer's web page).
